input.activity_signal: Company website found via search (bluip.com) shows current business operations. LinkedIn company profile indicates active presence. FCC Form 499 filing dated April 1, 2025 shows recent regulatory compliance as Universal Service Fund contributor. Multiple business profile sites (RocketReach, Crunchbase) list current revenue ($22M) and employee count (68).
input.product_summary: BluIP provides cloud-based communications and telephony solutions including Hosted PBX, SIP trunking, contact center services, and AI-powered business communications to SMB and enterprise customers across hospitality, healthcare, and other industries.
